title: WhatsApp might soon add support for rich link previews in status updates
content:
WhatsApp is reportedly working on a new feature that will automatically convert URLs shared as a status into rich link previews.Â WABetaInfo has spotted the in-development feature in the latest WhatsApp beta release for iOS and shared screenshots showcasing the upcoming change. The post WhatsApp might soon add support for rich link previews in status updates appeared first on XDA.
description: WhatsApp is reportedly working on a new feature that will automatically generate rich link previews in status updates. Read on to learn more.
